Text: Low Cost Merchant Accounts leThe EASIEST way to have your business income increase is simply by allowing your customers to purchase using their credit cards Visa Master Card Discover American Express you name it How Through a business Merchant Account NO SETUP FEES LOW MONTHLY COST We provide EVERYTHING you need to get started There are different packages to chose from and all are fully customizeable Hardware and Software to suit YOUR needs This offer applies to almost everyone including retail or online personal or business Regardless of whom your customers are you can use a merchant account to accept payment from them quickly and securely To obtain free information please speak with one of our sales reps Reply to this email with your full name phone number and any other info like best time to call or comments You will be contacted shortly by someone from our knowledgeable staff Your contact information will NOT be used for any purposes other than Merchant Accounts Thank you for your time Note For mailing list removal please reply with the word Remove in the subject line of the email We apologize for any inconveniences
